price: Hao ndio watakao pata sehemu yao kwa sababu ya yale waliyo yachuma. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwepesi wa kuhisabu.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
footnotes: Hawa wanapewa kama walivyo jaaliwa kuyachuma kwa kumwomba na kumtegemea Mwenyezi Mungu. Na Mwenyezi Mungu humlipa kila mtu kama anavyo stahiki, na ni Mwepesi wa kuhisabu na kulipa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ulāika lahum naṣībun mimmā kasabū wal-lahu sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
